pkgmetadata.longdescription: Meta-Analyses for Simultaneously Estimating Individual Means // Implement meta-analyses for simultaneously estimating individual means with shrinkage, isotonic regression and pretests. Include our original implementation of the isotonic regression via the pool-adjacent-violators algorithm (PAVA) algorithm. For the pretest estimator, the confidence interval for individual means are provided. Methodologies were published in Taketomi et al. (2021) doi:10.3390/axioms10040267, Taketomi et al. (2022) doi:10.3390/a15010026, Taketomi et al. (2023-) (under review).
